short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the overused word 'iconic' to the equally overused

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sick of reading the word 'iconic' to describe every minor piece of pop culture? This extension changes that word to ironic to give your browsing experience an even hipper edge. Waste of time, in all honesty.
